Package Controllers

package Controllers
Contains all the Servlets and Filters that App need to work. This sections contains only the backend logic.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AuthMiddleware
    This servlet handles the Sessions management for the whole application, where there is in bound an authorizations mechanism or an authorized section.
    CookieFilter
    This servlet handles the insert of the style and HTML objects in the pages every transaction and handle the Cookie management.
    CookieServlet
    This Servlet handles the creations of the Cookies in the frontend if there is the confirmation in the CookieFilter Servlet.
    CounterFilter
    This servlet allow the statistic of every page for the Admin Page Analytics Function The Filters intercept every call done to the pages in the lists.
    DonationServlet
    This controller is responsible for getting the donation value and processing it.
    LoginServlet
    This servlet handles the Login process.
    LogoutServlet
    Execute the logout actions server side (deleting the Sessions).
    MailServlet
    Execute the operations of sending to the admin of the site a request of contact.
    PagesServlet
    Return a JSON object with this structure: pageName: pageCounter
    PaymentServlet
    Returns all the payments data from the database with a JSON object.
    RetrieveAderentiServlet
    Returns a JSON object with all the Aderenti Users
    RetrieveInfoServlet
    Return all the users personal information in JSON.
    RetrieveRegistratiServlet
    Return all the registered users in JSON format.
    RetrieveSimpatizzantiServlet
    Return all the Simpatizzanti users in JSON.
    SendnewPhrasesServlet
    Send to front the lists with all the phrases in JSON.
    SendnewPhrasesServlet.PhraseWithAuthor
     
    SendnewPhrasesServlet.toBeReturned
     
    ServletAttivita
    Return all the activity in JSON.
    ServletAttivita.DataClassToSend
     
    ServletAttivita.NamedBool
     
    SignupServlet
    Allow the users to sign-up to the site.
    UnsubscribeServlet
    Allows users to unsibscribe from the site and remove all the data from database.
